    • createAccount

      public long createAccount(PersonalInformation info, StaffRole role, Decimal commission, String currency, String password, Long id) throws CheckedException
      Creates an account with the specified personal information, role, commission rate, local currency and password. An ID can also be specified for creation.
      Specified by:
      createAccount in interface IStaffAccessor
      Parameters:
      info - The personal information of the user.
      role - The role of the user.
      commission - The commission rate percentage of the user.
      currency - The local currency of the user.
      password - The user's password.
      id - The user's ID, null to generate a new one.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Account creation fails.
